# Solicitation Notice - BPM020490

## General Description
The Canadian government's Shared Services Canada (SSC) department is seeking a contractor to provide Dell Isilon hardware and software maintenance and support for the Department of National Defence (DND).

## Solicitation Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: SSC-24-00025077:T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM020490/25077
* **Publication Date**: January 5, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 23, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## notice
The solicitation seeks a contractor to provide Dell Isilon hardware and software maintenance and support for the DND. The contract will be awarded based on a competitive bidding process.

## Acquisition Category
The solicitation falls under the **Software and Hardware Maintenance** category.

## End User Entities
The end user entities for this contract are:

* **Shared Services Canada (SSC)**
* **Department of National Defence (DND)**

## Contract Location
The contractor will be required to perform the services at the Shared Services Canada office located at 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6K2, Canada.

## Contact Information
 Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to:

tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca

To access the solicitation, please visit the [P2P Portal](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public)
